title: Cryptic message about "END header not found" on build failure insufficient to track down the problem
body:
### Describe the bug

I am brand new to Java and Quarkus, and I am working on a project set up by other people. This project builds and deploys to production in CI/CD, so the issue is specific to my machine.

When I try to build my application I get this error:

Failed to execute goal io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin:1.11.1.Final:generate-code (default) on project {PROJECT_NAME}: Quarkus code generation phase has failed: Failed to bootstrap the application: Failed to create the application model for {PACKAGE_NAME}::jar:1.3.0: Failed to inject extension deplpyment dependencies: Failed to create a new filesystem for /Users/{USERNAME}/.m2/repository/org/apache/maven/resolver/maven-resolver-api/1.4.1/maven-resolver-api-1.4.1.jar: zip END header not found

Note that I replaced private information with {} placeholders.
Note the mis-spelling of deployment should make it easy to find this in the code.

I am not sure if this is really a bug, but there is not enough information here for me to track down the issue.

### Expected behavior

This project compiles and deploys to production in the CI/CD pipeline, and should compile on my machine also.

### Actual behavior

The build fails with an unhelpful error message.

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin {MACHINE_NAME}.local 21.3.0 Darwin Kernel Version 21.3.0: Wed Jan  5 21:37:58 PST 2022; root:xnu-8019.80.24~20/RELEASE_ARM64_T6000 arm64

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "13.0.2" 2020-01-14 OpenJDK Runtime Environment AdoptOpenJDK (build 13.0.2+8) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM AdoptOpenJDK (build 13.0.2+8, mixed mode, sharing)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

Latest - don't know how to query this

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.5 (3599d3414f046de2324203b78ddcf9b5e4388aa0) Maven home: /opt/homebrew/Cellar/maven/3.8.5/libexec Java version: 13.0.2, vendor: AdoptOpenJDK, runtime: /Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/adoptopenjdk-13.jdk/Contents/Home Default locale: en_US, platform encoding: UTF-8 OS name: "mac os x", version: "10.16", arch: "x86_64", family: "mac"

### Additional information

_No response_
